answers.answer: Oh yeah. I'm a little worried that I'm eating too much. I don't want my doctor to tell me in gaining too much weight. But I seriously can't stop eating
if youre hungry, eat. unless you're scarfing down like triple yourcalories you should eat, your weight gain will be fine
I am the same way!  I wake up starving in the middle of the night.  I'm so tired of eating already lol
Haha me too. But my family has a massive history of gestational diabetes,  so I need to rain it in.... trying to get back into exercise.  Never thought I'd be hungry and nauseous at the same time

question: I'm 8 weeks 2 days and I'm famished all the time! Anyone else?
title: hungry all the time!
